item.title: My first runescape script -3rd script overall
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Pretty nice…Try to use some scripting standard e.g. Skipping “tabbing” so it’s easier to read e.g.
Also try not to use coords for runescape scripts VERY detectable also play around with bitmaps, for they can be very useful look for tuts and keep learning!

item.title: My first runescape script -3rd script overall
item.dc:creator: @legolas5802 legolas5802
item.description:
@legolas5802 wrote:

here it is this only works for runescape client and client has to be in first spot on start menu NOT FIRST SPOT ON RECENT LIST
if u dont have rs client u cans get by going to www.runescape.com then clciking extra downloads and get rs client

if u have slow internet u mite want to adjust wait times and thank you

program Superlog;

const
Username='PASSWORD HERE';
Password='USERNAME HERE';
begin
writeln('only works in small version of runescape client, and runescape must be first on list, NOT RECENT LIST')
ClickMouse(55,755, True);
ClickMouse(40,488, True);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(722,284, True);
wait (2250);
ClickMouse(728,363, True);
wait (2200);
ClickMouse(416,289, True);
wait (7250);
ClickMouse(546,403, True);
wait (550);
sendkeys(Username);
wait (200);
sendkeysVB('{ENTER}',false);
wait (500);
sendkeys(Password)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(440,440, True);
end.

Thanks to Do0mz for telling me the scripting commands for mouse click
yes it is detectable but all i t does is sign in lol

well i g2g for the nite
